original: 西晉宗室。謙虛節儉，素有名聲。雖掌握軍權，亦居高位，但並未介入八王之亂中，同時亦無穩定亂局之舉。
text: Western Jin Dynasty clan. Modest and frugal, has a reputation. Although he holds the military power and is in a high position, he did not intervene in the chaos of the Eight Kings, and at the same time he did not act to stabilize the chaos.
